Articles.Content: OMG, this movie is awesome, watch the trailer here: [http://kungfury.vhx.tv/](http://kungfury.vhx.tv/)

How can you post the offical trailer and not post the music video for the movies lead track?! ITS GOT THE 'HOFF

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZTidn2dBYbY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
I assumed everybody will find out about the music by themself ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Kung Fury is now available for free to watch on Steam. Enjoy ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Im watching it tonight with some buddies. cant wait

Someone linked a Youtube version on IRC. I got about halfway through before I had to pick up the remaining bits of my sanity and abscond.

that movie is something else

Yeah it is easy to find on Youtube on their official channel. Not sure if we can post the link here because rules, but I watched it and thought it was hitlerious, ahem, hilarious.

I thought it was great.

> 
> How can you post the offical trailer and not post the music video for the movies lead track?! ITS GOT THE 'HOFF
